creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Virginia Dofflemyer
description: plate with foot ring; flat narrow rim; top has red ground with gold leaves and orange and gold flowers; white central circle with red, blue and grey flowers; two cartouches on rim in green with blue flowers; two cartouches on rim with multicolored birds on blue, white and grey peonies; exterior decorated with orange bats and clouds
title: Plate
